full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 499-2 Filed 11/23/21 Page 109 of 159108
LBAAMAX3ps
Rocchio - Cross
1 Q. "Forensic psychology" refers to the professional practice by any psychologist when applying psychology to the law to assist to address legal matters. Is that the definition?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. And forensic and therapeutic roles are very different, correct?
4 A. Yes, they are.
5 Q. And a therapeutic role typically is not going to involve a forensic component, correct?
6 A. Correct.
7 Q. And that would be somewhat of a boundary violation, correct?
8 A. It would be a dual role.
9 Q. OK. Do you consider yourself to be in a forensic capacity here?
10 A. Here today, yes.
11 Q. Yes. And so subject to the forensic guidelines by the APA, correct?
12 A. That's correct.
13 Q. On April 23rd, the government sent a letter outlining what the government said were your opinions in this matter. Did you review that letter before the government sent it?
14 A. I've reviewed that letter, I'm not sure at what stage in the process. I believe so, though, yes.
15 (Continued on next page)
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00007977

1 Q. "Forensic psychology" refers to the professional practice by any psychologist when applying psychology to the law to assist to address legal matters. Is that the definition?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. And forensic and therapeutic roles are very different, correct?
4 A. Yes, they are.
5 Q. And a therapeutic role typically is not going to involve a forensic component, correct?
6 A. Correct.
7 Q. And that would be somewhat of a boundary violation, correct?
8 A. It would be a dual role.
9 Q. OK. Do you consider yourself to be in a forensic capacity here?
10 A. Here today, yes.
11 Q. Yes. And so subject to the forensic guidelines by the APA, correct?
12 A. That's correct.
13 Q. On April 23rd, the government sent a letter outlining what the government said were your opinions in this matter. Did you review that letter before the government sent it?
14 A. I've reviewed that letter, I'm not sure at what stage in the process. I believe so, though, yes.
